channel.title: Beginning in Loaders
channel.description:
Hello, Iwas reading this wonderful guide [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,294949.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,294949.0.html[/url] and most of it was quite straight foward to me, so I decided I'll try my hand at my own loader. So with a new account, a quickly edited client and a simple loader I tried my luck. Well that failed.
So I worked out that the loader wasn't loading my edited classes. Looking back to the guide, it says that we hack the loader to do so. Easy enough i thought. So i tried to decompile the Loader class with JODE.. Assertion error. Fantastic.
So then I tried to make a deob version of the loader didn't work. Still not wanting to ask for help(I dread asking for help), I searched around and saw a topic about unsigned clients. One problem, I don't know how to do that.
So i'm finally asking for help; 1) How do I "hack" the loader to load my classes? 2) How do I unsign the client to not need the loader?
I'm willing to read and learn any link that you could provide me. Thank you in advance.

item.title: Beginning in Loaders
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Or have a look at Cherokee on sourceforge:

http://sourceforge.net/projects/cherokeeengine/

Make sure you check out the latest SVN and don’t just download the initial release.

Read full topic

item.title: Beginning in Loaders
item.dc:creator: @the_bank the bank
item.description:
@the_bank wrote:

Look at an open-source BCEL bot, such as RSBot.

Read full topic

item.title: Beginning in Loaders

item.description:
@shangtsung1 wrote:

in your custom ClassLoader, use Bcel too transform the classes
assuming you have your own classloader

Read full topic

item.title: Beginning in Loaders
item.dc:creator: @surfer25 surfer25
item.description:
@surfer25 wrote:

Hello,
Iwas reading this wonderful guide http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,294949.0.html and most of it was quite straight foward to me, so I decided I’ll try my hand at my own loader. So with a new account, a quickly edited client and a simple loader I tried my luck. Well that failed.

So I worked out that the loader wasn’t loading my edited classes. Looking back to the guide, it says that we hack the loader to do so. Easy enough i thought. So i tried to decompile the Loader class with JODE… Assertion error. Fantastic.

So then I tried to make a deob version of the loader didn’t work. Still not wanting to ask for help(I dread asking for help), I searched around and saw a topic about unsigned clients. One problem, I don’t know how to do that.

So i’m finally asking for help;

  1. How do I “hack” the loader to load my classes?
  2. How do I unsign the client to not need the loader?

I’m willing to read and learn any link that you could provide me.
Thank you in advance.

Read full topic
